keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: A Mexican-style dish where the chicken mixture is rolled up in a soft wheat tortilla.

method.text: Cut each apple slice in half lengthways. Put into a bowl with the lime juice and toss together.

Heat oil in a large frying pan. Add onion and cook over a high heat for 2 min. Add garlic, chillies, spices and chicken. Fry, stirring, for about 5 min until chicken is golden. Lift chicken out of pan and set aside.

Add apple with the lime juice and water to pan and cook with onions for 3 min. Return chicken to pan and continue to cook for 5 min until apples are tender but still hold their shape. Season. Add fresh coriander.
Meanwhile, heat tortillas as pack instructions. The quickest way is to transfer them to a plate, cover with film and microwave on high for 20-30 seconds.

title: Chicken and apple fajitas
